page.title: 12UNEMPLOYMENT IN SHEFFIELD
page.content: Many middle aged people have lost their jobs and cannot get others.A large majority of school leavers will find no employment,and have to face problems of lack of finance,boredom and frustration.Nor are things likely to improve in the near future. The Local Council in Sheffield allow the unemployed free use of all its facilities. And finally,one small success story for our area.The Manpower Services Commission administrates Job Centres, Youth Training Schemes and and Skill Centres,has moved its national Headquarters here from London,because the ground rent is much cheaper.
